From:

Subject: U. S. v. Thomas, No. 19 Cr 830 - Discovery Production 7 
Date: Wed, 14 Apr 2021 13:44:41 +0000 
Attachments: 2021.04.14_Thomas_Discovety_Letter -_Production_7.pdf; SDNY_00018025-
SDNY 00018025 JAEO).pdf 
Counsel, 
Please find attached a letter regarding the Government's production in this case. We are uploading a zip file containing 
the discovery materials to USAfx. Additionally, please find attached one additional page of discovery, which has been 
marked attorney's eyes only. Please contact us with any questions or if you have any difficulty accessing the production. 
Regards, 
Paralegal
